wikipedia_page.main: Angela Eleine Thomas  is a consultant paediatric haematologist and former director of the haemophilia centre, Royal Infirmary of Edinburgh.

response: Florida Playwrights' Theatre or FPT was a 54-seat black box theatre in Hollywood, Florida that was in operation from 1993 to 1999.  It was begun by Paul and Angela Thomas, whose goal was to create a small repertory company that would produce new plays and little-known plays, as well as the classics, including their annual Shakespeare festivals.
* Laughing Wild by Christopher Durang (Carbonell Award 'nomination for Best Actress Angela Thomas)
